annotations:
Attn: Chartering Desk

 

Kindly propose suitable to below direct / firm:

 

Commodity: Granular Sulphur

Quantity: 50000 mt +/- 5%

Load Port: Bandar Abbas, Iran

Load Rate: 5000 mt pwwd fhinc

Laycan: 10-15th September,2024

Discharge Port: One safe port one safe berth South China or one safe port one safe berth Da Feng Port ( Chopt)

Discharge Rate: 8000 mt shinc pwwd basis

Adcom: 2.5% for charterere + 1.25 GLIMPEX

Freight payment: 3 days before arrival of vessel

+++++

 

Commodity: Granular Sulphur

Quantity: 50000 mt +/- 5%

Load Port: Bandar Abbas, Iran

Load Rate: 5000 mt pwwd fhinc

Laycan: 5th -10th September,2024

Discharge Port: One safe port one safe berth  Paradip Port, India

Discharge Rate: 12000 mt SSHEXEIU pwwd basis

Adcom: 2.5% for charterers + 1.25 GLIMPEX

Freight payment: 3 days before arrival of vessel
